babelModules.description: Report message when modules option si not false

configExists_description.message: `webpack-config/config-exists` warns against not having a webpack configuration file

configExists.description: Report message when a webpack configuration file doesn't exists
configExists.message: webpack configuration file not found in your project.

esnext.description: Report message when the compilerOptions.module doesn't have esnext configured

isInstalled_description.message: `webpack-config/is-installed` warns against not having webpack installed

isValid_description.message: `webpack-config/is-valid` warns against providing an invalid webpack configuration file `webpack.config.js`

isInstalled.description: Report message when webpack is not installed in your project
isInstalled.message: webpack is not installed in your project.

moduleEsnextTypescript_description.message: `webpack-config/module-esnext-typescript` warns against not having set the propety `compilerOptions.module` to `esnext` in typescript configuration file

modulesFalseBabel_description.message: `webpack-config/modules-false-babel` warns against not having set the propety `modules` to `false` in presets in babel configuration file

noDevtoolInProd_description.message: `webpack-config/no-devtool-in-prod` warns against having set the propety `devtool` to `eval`

noEval.description: Report message when devtool = eval is configured for production
